xxl.core.util.timers
Class StopWatch

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.util.timers.StopWatch

public class StopWatch
extends Object

This class provides a simple to use stop watch. Just call start, pause or stop to get the time something goes.

Field Summary
static StopWatch DEFAULT_INSTANCE
          Default stop watch; ready to use
protected  long pausedTime
          Time in millis the watch has paused
protected  long startingTime
          Time in millis when the watch has started
protected  long stopingTime
          Time in millis when the watch has stopped
 
Constructor Summary

          Constructs a new instance of a stop watch.
StopWatch(boolean paused)
          Constructs a new instance of a stop watch starting in paused mode
 
Method Summary
 long getTime()
          Returns the passed time between start and stop resp. between start and now.
 String getTimeString()
          Returns the passed time between start and stop resp. between start and now.
 void pause()
          Pauses the stop watch
 void resume()
          Resumes the paused stop watch.
 void start()
          Starts the stop watch.
 void stop()
          Stops the stop watch.
static String timeAsString(long t)
          Returns a given time in milliseconds as String.

          Returns a String representation of this stop watch.

Returns a String representation of this stop watch.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
a String representation of this stop watch. If the watch is already stopped recorded time will be returned.
